member.name: M:OneToolkit.Data.HighPerformance.UnsafeReplace(System.String,System.Char,System.Char)
member.summary: Replaces all occurences of a specific character with another character in a string without creating a new one.
member.remarks: The specified string must be truly yours. Modifing existing strings can cause issues later on.
